Just like every other game, you'll find toxic tryhards, chill people that can eventually be really great friends of yours, or just the people that dont talk. Been playing this game since 2016, its a lot of fun, and they always have cool updates. The new operation is a bit more expensive than the older ones but its still fun to join in and hangout with the community. If you're into FPS games I highly suggest this one, its a whole lot of fun until you get angry when you loose. :)
Best competitive shooter there is, hands down.
за многие обновления, эта игра не утратила свою главную особенность - "выигрывает не у кого много денег, и не тот, у кого есть скилл, а тот, у кого читы настроены лучше".
Endless hours of entertainment, even after 10 years. Valve is constantly adding new content and providing updates. Plus its free.
Bom jogo, apenas poderia ter mais recompensas para quem comprou o jogo, pois o jogo agora esta de graça e fica um pouco deshonesto com as pessoas que o compraram antigamente.
